New Records: Jasprit Bumrah returned to international cricket with a bang, taking two wickets on his return
Key Match Events: Rain washed out most of the Indian innings
Jasprit Bumrah got a wicket off the second ball he bowled
Tilak Varma falls first ball for 0
Jaiswal miscues the pull and is out for 24
Barry McCarthy and Curtis Campher led a fightback for Ireland

Post-Match Reflections: India thus go 1-0 up in the series with the only takeaways being Bumrah's impressive return to international cricket and McCarthy's brilliant innings that led Ireland's fightback
